storyInfo: The vigilante Haze overhears some information not meant for her, and inadvertently gets a store burned down during her escape. She talks Susie out of suicide, but then passes out as her Oripathy flares up.

attributes.content: November 19th, 1097, 9:20 P.M.
This way!
attributes.name: Security Guard A

attributes.content: Up ahead.
attributes.name: Security Guard A

attributes.content: They're over there still. I think I can see her.
attributes.name: Security Guard A

attributes.content: Wait, didn't we just pass this road sign?
attributes.name: Security Guard A

attributes.content: We're back to where we were. I mean, we're running in circles.
attributes.name: Security Guard B

attributes.content: See, I knew it. There's something funny about the Feline's Arts.
attributes.name: Security Guard B

attributes.content: Calm down. The Infected community's up ahead. The thief's definitely hiding somewhere in there.
attributes.name: Security Guard A

attributes.content: Damned Infected... I'll find them, even if I have to flip the place upside down.
attributes.name: Security Guard A

attributes.content: That's enough. Let's head back.
attributes.name: Security Chief

attributes.content: Are you sure we should just let her go, Chief? What about the money and the merchandise?
attributes.name: Security Guard A

attributes.content: Forget it. She didn't take that much. We'll all chip in a little and foot the bill.
attributes.name: Security Chief

attributes.content: The boss made it very clear he didn't want any unnecessary trouble.
attributes.name: Security Chief

attributes.content: Give him any more fuss, and a sacking will be the least of your worries.
attributes.name: Security Chief

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Security Chief

attributes.content: Hehee~
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: You'll have to be a little smarter than that to catch a cat~
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Minnie. You there?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Miss Witch!
attributes.name: Infected Girl

attributes.content: Here you go. Your meal and medicine for today.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Thanks!
attributes.name: Infected Girl

attributes.content: Don't eat too fast. You mustn't choke on your food.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: A slice of bread, and enough rice to stifle her hunger for the day.
When exactly did I start helping people?
And why? I had enough trouble keeping myself alive.
*cough*... *cough*...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Miss... You don't look too well.
attributes.name: Infected Girl

attributes.content: Really...? Is it that obvious?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: When can I start using Originium Arts like you?
attributes.name: Infected Girl

attributes.content: Not today~
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Huh...? But I wanna be a witch too. Like you.
attributes.name: Infected Girl

attributes.content: Maybe once you get a bit bigger, kit.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: *cough*... *cough*...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Sharp pain.
The sharp, prickling pain of this Oripathy lesion hasn't stopped hurting for the past three months.
Maybe it's time to leave this place.
It wouldn't be nice if anyone got caught in the crystallization when it finally happens.
No, when the time comes to wave goodbye to this world, it must be done elegantly and in perfect solitude—
That's how a proper kitten and a Caster from the Witch Forest is supposed to go.
One pub, two pubs, three pubs...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Seven kits, eight kits, nine kits...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Take a guess how many pubs and stray cats there are in this Infected block.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: I know, because I counted. There are eight pubs and thirty-two stray kittens.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: That's four kittens to each pub, and a fresh fin for each kitten.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Have you ever counted how many cities you've visited, how many Infected settlements you've seen?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: I have. Five cities, eight settlements, and seventeen prison breaks.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: I've been to many cities, but Caladon is definitely one of the more interesting ones.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Everyone's the same here. They're out to make a living when the sun goes up, and they're into the pub to drink when the sun goes down. When they close their eyes at night, they never worry about what the next day will bring.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Infected, normals. What's the difference?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Maybe one day, with a loud 'kaboom,' the whole of Caladon Bay will slip into the sea, and that'll be the wonderful end of everything~
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Which is why, if I had to pick a place to die, this wouldn't be too bad a choice.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: A place where I can look down on the whole city, and my body's turning to stone, and then, 'bang!'
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Nothing left of me, no one any the wiser. But nonetheless, I'll have to pick a place that's farther away, lest the dust drift its way down into the streets.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: The rocks in my body seem to have calmed down...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Looks like it's not yet time. At least, not today.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Until that day comes, I always have to think about where I'll find tomorrow's fun.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Oh, I didn't even notice. The sun's already up.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Good morning, Victoria. Good morning, Caladon.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: So, who's the lucky contestant who gets a visit from the kitty today?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: November 23th, 1097, 10:14 P.M.
Not a soul in these buildings here... Is it how close it is to the abandoned districts?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: An old warehouse... Hm...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Maybe there's something I can use?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Let's take a peek~
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Food... There can't be food here, right?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Maybe something I can make a fiver or so from?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Whoa, whoa, that's a bit of dust. And it reeks of machine oil. Nothing quite adorable here.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: This vase looks pretty, though—
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Don't touch nothin'.
I don't get it. All we're doing is kidnapping a few Infected and an old man. Why get everybody all puffed up?
Shut up. Do your job and get paid. Don't ask questions.
(Phew...)
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Counted up the weapons yet?
Lookin' good. Prob'ly overkill for a rickety old councilor.
(Weapons? Councilor? Bo~ring...)
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Keep your eyes open, though. Those goons are hired guns, I don't trust 'em.
What about the explosives? We don't need to worry about the Originium bombs?
We got guys to handle that for us. Not our department.
All we gotta do is ready the weapons and Arts Units. We're good to go in three hours.
Then we just wait at the Boil 'til they're done and pick up from there.
Who's that?!
You hear that?
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: Weird... I thought I locked the doors.
attributes.name: Sly Black-Suit

attributes.content: I heard it loud and clear. Someone's in here.
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: Someone? Where?
attributes.name: Sly Black-Suit

attributes.content: No hiding in a room this small. It's probably just some cat.
attributes.name: Sly Black-Suit

attributes.content: Yeah, that's it. Just a cat tempting fate in here.
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: Let's see now... Which little kitten came pokin' her head into a place she shouldn't have?
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: Don't be so petty. Can't a passing stray kit take shelter here for the night?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Who are you?
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: An Infected? Perfect timing there.
attributes.name: Sly Black-Suit

attributes.content: I told you. I'm just a stray cat passing by. I wandered in here by chance alone.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Won't you overlook this if I give you this pretty vase?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: What you heard don't matter. I don't care if you really did stumble in by accident, but now that we found you—you ain't gettin' outta here alive.
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: It's curtains for you, kitten.
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: Haven't you heard? Bad luck befalls those who harm cats.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Missed?
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: How's she still... What's with this mist—
attributes.name: Sly Black-Suit

attributes.content: Hohoh, what's the rush now? How about I give you two a riddle to chew on.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: 'Why is a rock like a firework?'
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: You ain't goin' nowhere!
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: This should be far enough...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Eugh... A noble's room. The smell always makes me lose my lunch.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: My shoulder... That angry lad's a fair decent shot...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: At least it didn't nick any bones...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: (Grabs the arrow's shaft)
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Um... Miss? Who might you be?
attributes.name: Old Noble

attributes.content: Don't move!
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Ack—
attributes.name: Old Noble

attributes.content: Shh! Quiet! I don't want to kill you. I just need to hide here for a spell.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: You'd best work with me here. If you don't behave, this arrow will—
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Calm down, miss. No need to be so tense.
attributes.name: Old Noble

attributes.content: You... You look hurt. Do you need any assistance?
attributes.name: Old Noble

attributes.content: Stay back!
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: The black smoke manifested by her Originium Arts spreads throughout the room. The old man takes a step backward and falls to the ground.
Sir, are you alright?
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: (Nervous)
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Old Noble

attributes.content: I'm writing my proposal. Do not disturb me until daybreak.
attributes.name: Old Noble

attributes.content: Very good, sir.
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: Miss... *cough*... *cough*...
attributes.name: Old Noble

attributes.content: If my hunch is correct, you should be an Infected.
attributes.name: Old Noble

attributes.content: Don't be afraid. I won't hurt you.
attributes.name: Old Noble

attributes.content: The elderly Savra noble suddenly grabs his chest and lets out a pained moan.
What is it? I was just giving you a scare with my Arts.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Oh... well, there's a bother.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Someone, help! We have a man down!
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: (Oh well, about time to go...)
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Something wrong, sir? I heard a girl...
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: Master Angst! What happened?!
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: What do we do now? Shouldn't we just kick in the door and get her?
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: You stupid or somethin'? Don't you know who lives here?
attributes.name: Sly Black-Suit

attributes.content: That's Councilor Angst's mansion!
attributes.name: Sly Black-Suit

attributes.content: Councilor? That's like a lord? Here, of all places?
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: Why would a councilor live right by the Infected? And ain't this house kinda small?
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: Just shut your mouth. We'll figure out another way.
attributes.name: Sly Black-Suit

attributes.content: There she is!
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: Showin' yourself, huh? Saves us the trouble of dragging you out!
attributes.name: Sly Black-Suit

attributes.content: You two... You're a pain in my rear...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Don't even think about it!
attributes.name: Sly Black-Suit

attributes.content: Get her!
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: She took a hit. She won't get far.
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: Watch her Arts, though. We don't know if they can kill, but they definitely mess with our senses.
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: Let's see what she's capable of—
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: It's fogging up again? She's castin'!
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: She ducked in here, huh?
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: 'Green Spark...' Some kinda pub? Don't look like it.
attributes.name: Sly Black-Suit

attributes.content: All these old buildings are pretty much the same. There's no way out but the way she came in. She's trapped.
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: Slow down. No rush.
attributes.name: Sly Black-Suit

attributes.content: The Feline's got some fancy Arts. Watch the smoke. Won't be easy to catch her alive, or take her down either.
attributes.name: Sly Black-Suit

attributes.content: And we don't got so much time to deal with her.
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: Still got those incendiaries?
attributes.name: Sly Black-Suit

attributes.content: You wanna burn the place down?
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: The buildings around here are packed pretty tight. You sure about that?
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: Hurry up already! Nobody cares about the Infected. Even if it makes a scene, that's just a distraction for us.
attributes.name: Sly Black-Suit

attributes.content: You think too much. Just get to it.
attributes.name: Sly Black-Suit

attributes.content: We can't afford to make any mistakes here. We need her done in. Capiche?
attributes.name: Sly Black-Suit

attributes.content: Gotcha.
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*... *cough*.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: That'll do the trick. Now let's skedaddle.
attributes.name: Sly Black-Suit

attributes.content: Goddamned diseased cat... made me spend all night running around the city.
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: I hear that when the Infected die, they turn to ash and explode? Never seen it for myself, though.
attributes.name: Imposing Black-Suit

attributes.content: Don't worry about that. Let's go.
attributes.name: Sly Black-Suit

attributes.content: You'll have to be smarter than that... to catch a cat.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Listen up... You didn't drive me into this corner... It's only because of my condition...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: November 26th, 1097, 9:27 A.M.
Sharp pain.
Her lungs hurt, her stomach hurts, her liver hurts.
Looks like normal painkillers... don't do a thing anymore.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Stricken with pain and disease, the Feline girl looks up at the sky through the windows of the abandoned house.
A heavy fog shrouds the entire city of Caladon, to the point that the sun's radiance can no longer be seen.
From the Grey Hills to Toron, then Castshire and finally to Caladon.
I kept running, wandering the world without aim. My friends all died one by one.
And the further I got, the more I lost.
Even a dandelion caught on the wind ends up settling somewhere.
This kitty's all too tired out.
Miss Witch, are you okay?
attributes.name: Infected Girl

attributes.content: *cough*... *cough*...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Is that blood?
attributes.name: Infected Girl

attributes.content: It looks like... this is the end.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Minnie, I have something for you...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Do you know how much these coins are worth?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Infected Girl

attributes.content: Take one to Grandma Winnie every day and ask her to give you something to eat.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: And here.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: The Feline witch takes out a black hat and an exquisite ring.
(*Sigh*... The Witch's Ceremony... Not that it has much meaning left to it anymore.)
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: I am Haze, the Hundred and Thirteenth Witch of the Witch Forest...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: May the Grey Hills' sages of the past bear witness to it all.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Witness the entrance of a new member to our ranks...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Witness the birth of a new soul...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Infected Girl

attributes.content: Do you remember what you asked me before?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Now you're a witch.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Really? So I can use Arts now?
attributes.name: Infected Girl

attributes.content: Listen. You've always been able to use Arts. You have a gift for it.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: But when you use them, you need to use this ring. Just like I taught you before. Without this ring, you aren't allowed to use Originium Arts. Understand?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Infected Girl

attributes.content: Also, you're only allowed to use Originium Arts on bad people. You remember how to tell bad people, don't you?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Yes!
attributes.name: Infected Girl

attributes.content: That's good...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: The Feline witch stands up and struggles toward the exit.
Miss Witch? Are you leaving?
attributes.name: Infected Girl

attributes.content: Yes... It's time for me to go...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: November 27th, 1097, 3:47 A.M.
The abandoned district on the edge of Caladon. It's the quietest part of the city.
Ever since a natural disaster swept across Caladon a few years ago, this district, having fallen into disrepair, was moved to the edge of the city.
The crumbling buildings, the collapsed foundations. All of it bore witness to Caladon's history.
Gazing out from the top of the abandoned towers, there is but a vast, endless wasteland in the distance.
If I had to pick a resting place, this might be one of the fun ones.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: I knew this day would come. I can't really say it came sooner than expected, either.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: The Feline witch sits against a wall in a corner and gently closes her eyes.
The sharp pain of the Oripathy lesion is starting to fade, and her body feels heavier and heavier by the moment.
Her memories flash quickly by, as though playing back before her eyes.
All her witch friends, the gentle Great Witch Grant, and the night the Victorian soldiers burned the Witch Forest by their cannon fire.
The times she spent drifting in the wastelands and the cities, the days she had to steal to get by, and all the unfair treatment she has suffered.
None of it matters anymore.
It's all coming to an end.
Yet, suddenly, she hears someone sobbing.
I can't even have my last moments to myself, can I...?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Now I know this place gets visitors.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Haze follows the wailing to another part of the abandoned tower.
In front of her, a Feline girl stands next to a window, trembling.
*Sigh*.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: (Sobs)
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: Sorry... I'm sorry, Mum... I'm so sorry...
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: I... I don't know what to do anymore.
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: With a helpless, grief-stricken look, the Feline girl totters at the edge of the building.
That's very dangerous, you know?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Yagh!
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: Wh-Who are you...?
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: Nobody important.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: But I do need to tell you a few things before you jump.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: After you do it, you won't be nearly as adorable as you are now. Honestly, I can't recommend it.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Your friends will be awfully sad to see you in that state when they find you tomorrow.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Friends... Quercus...
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: The sobbing girl hesitates and steps back from the window.
That's better, now!
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: What do I call you, little kitten?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Susie... Susie Glitter.
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: That's a pretty name.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: You can call me Haze.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Miss... Haze...
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: Miss Haze... What are you doing out here so late?
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: I was about to ask you the same. This is my personal, secret hideout. How did you find it?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Oh, well, I can give a cute little kit like you special permission to play about here. But not if you've come for a cordless bungee jump, however.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: *Sniffles*...
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: Oh, dear, what are you crying for?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: *Sigh*... It's okay. Cry all you want. No one will hear you, so no need to hold it in.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Nobody's ever around here—though there's no booze, either. It would be nice if we had some, though, wouldn't it?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: What I do have for you is free time. Come, have a talk with me?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Why were you about to do something so silly?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: I... had this dream. I've had it for years...
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: A years-long dream? That sounds lovely.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: I... I worked so hard towards for it, years upon years...
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: It was... I dedicated my whole life to it.
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: And a few days ago, it was gone in the blink of an eye... Somebody destroyed all of it...
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: And I don't even know why...
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: None of it's left... nothing...
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: How much time do us Infected get, anyway?
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: Someone destroyed it, you say...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: And so the first thing that came to mind was to destroy yourself too?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Seems awfully odd, doesn't it?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Huh... Huh? What do you mean?
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: Well, you said it yourself. Someone destroyed your beautiful dream and your life's work, but what are you doing now? Aren't you trying to destroy the very last thing you have?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: No... That's not it...
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: Show me your hand. Let me see it.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Huh? Huh? What are you doing?
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: No crystals... It looks like you aren't too far along?
attributes.name: Haze
Susie
attributes.content: I—I don't have much idea myself...

attributes.name: Susie
attributes.content: Eep! What are you bonking me for?
A silly kit with a muddled head. You need some sense knocked into you.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Living for a dream... That's quite the luxury for an Infected.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Most of us are just trudging along aimlessly, from one day to the next.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: 'We don't have that much longer to live. Why tire yourself out with goals and ideals?'
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: But you chose to make your dream come true, and that's impressive. There aren't a lot of people like you out there.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: But, you see... So long as you're alive, things will work out.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: You have more time than you think, not like... I digress.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: It'd be a shame to give up just like that.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: But what can I do?
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: I'm sure a cute little kitten like you has lots of friends.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Why don't you go talk to them? You won't get anywhere mulling over it by yourself.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: If you've lost something, find it. If someone stole something of yours, find a way to steal it back.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Give up like this, and you won't have a single thing left, you know?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: The bad ones will laugh ever harder, and that's no fair to yourself.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: It's the bad ones ruining your dreams who should be thrown off the tower, not you. Don't you think?
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: The young Feline looks hesitantly at the window. Her face is shrouded in helplessness. Time drifts slowly by in the pitch dark of this abandoned tower.
She spends a brief moment pondering in silence, before finally letting out a long sigh and freeing an exhausted smile. It seems the weight on her shoulders is gone.
You're right.
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: Now, if you still feel down in the dumps, just cry it all out. Nobody's around to judge you.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: No... It's okay... Thanks...
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: That's more like it.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: The Great Witch says, as long as the sun rises tomorrow, there is still hope.
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: As long as... there... is a...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Hum? Um?! Miss Haze, what's the matter?!
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: Be careful... stay away from me...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: Miss Haze! What's wrong?
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: Go... hurry...
attributes.name: Haze

attributes.content: What's wrong? Why is your body so hot?
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: Hang in there! Wake up!
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: Somebody! Please help!
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: Miss Haze... Stay with me. We... We're almost to the city...
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: I... I can barely carry you anymore...
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: S-Sorry, I don't mean you're heavy, you're really very light, I just don't have much strength...
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: The girl on her back grows weaker and weaker by the minute.
She can feel a vibrant life slowly fading away.
A wet, yet warm feeling gushes onto her back and gradually spreads all over.
This... What is this...?
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: Is it... blood?
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: Dark red blood spills from the girl's mouth and nose, dripping onto the ground.
Susie knows what this means. All Infected do.
No... No... No...
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: Haze... Please... I'm begging you...
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: Ever since she left home five years ago, she's witnessed the passing of many Infected.
With each death she's seen, she's grown increasingly numb to them.
This is the fate that awaits all Infected.
But, for some reason, she finds herself unwilling to bear the pain of this life disappearing before her.
Please! Miss Haze... Please... No...
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: Hang on... We're almost there...
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: She sets the girl down to ease her pain.
She tightly grasps Haze's hand and tries her best to wipe away the blood on her face.
Hopeless though it may be, she tries her hardest to stall the coming of death.
Yet death draws ever nearer. It all seems to come to such a meaningless head.
Help... Help!!!
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: Anyone... Please...
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: Help me...
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: Help me...
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: Her low cries pierce through the empty night sky, echoing throughout the empty, abandoned streets.
Just then, she hears someone walking slowly towards them.
Susie...? What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Red
